name: SpaceConnect
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4.

This game is safe for kids.   Concept and play-testing were done by my youngest son. 

The goal is to turn all the targets either red or green at the same time. 

Play with your kids by having one player on the A key, the other on the right arrow. 

Keys:

Quit: Escape 

Left paddle: A or left arrow

Right paddle: D or right arrow

-- Have fun.
